author: cheeky_gorilla
content:
Any chance someone has an up-to-date source on the expected reduction in cost for L2s posting data after 4844? "10x" and "orders of magnitude" cheaper gets thrown around, but maybe there's something more exact? Or otherwise, a rough estimate based on recent testing?

And perhaps a source on how this impacts the overall TPS? I have the below from Ben Edgington, but it's relatively old! https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1p5Q32odNNhK1d8fAXc7O4u7CWiUtYSBuGn9IiemcRa8/edit#slide=id.g1d5931c790e_0_1747

Need this for "Impact Metrics" for Protocol Guild's RPGF 3 application! ðŸ˜‹

author: abcoathup
content: Given it's retroactive PGF maybe wait for Dencun to go live (assuming this will happen after RPGF 3 voted on) and include EIP4844 in RPGF 4 with actual metrics.

content: Yeah I get where you're coming from, but although the implementation isnt 100% done yet, the research is! So that's work that could be retroactively rewarded! In any case, we're just trying to be thorough in the application, mentioning as many things as the character count allows ðŸ™‚
